p: The relative performance of the two strategies may be compared by finding the point at which their costs are equal, r * (m), an approach similar to Cacho's ‘critical decision points’ (Cacho et al. 2008). The analytic expression is shown in eqn 4. It allows us to separate ‘management space’ into two regions separated by the line defined by these solutions. To one side of this line, eradication is the cheaper option, and to the other, containment.
